description: The Fieldset component is a wrapper around manual field component creation. You simply pass it an fields object and all field components will automatically be created including a nice field grid. This is the ideal starting point if you want an easy way to create fields without having to deal with a full form element.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, all fields in the fieldset are disabled

props.name: fields
props.description:
Object with field definitions. Check out the field components
for available props

props.name: novalidate
props.description: If `true`, form fields won't show their validation status on the fly.

props.name: value
props.description: Key/Value object with all values for all fields

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus a specific field in the fieldset or the first one if no name is given

methods.name: hasFieldType
methods.description: Check if a particular field type exists

methods.name: hasField
methods.description: Check if a field with the given name exists in the fieldset
